# File lib/jabber4r/protocol.rb, line 650
650:       def Message.from_element(session, element)
651:         message = Message.new(element.attr_to)
652:         message.from = Jabber::JID.new(element.attr_from) if element.attr_from
653:         message.type = element.attr_type
654:         message.id = element.attr_id
655:         message.thread = element.thread.element_data
656:         message.body = element.body.element_data
657:         message.xhtml = element.xhtml.element_data
658:         message.subject = element.subject.element_data
659:         message.oobData = element.x.element_data
660:         message.session=session
661:         return message
662:       end
